content: उत्सिच् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sprinkle, spread, pour down. {@--2@} To make proud. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To spout or foam up; उत्सिच्यमाने पयसि <ls>Bhāg.</ls> {@--2@} To be puffed up or proud, be elated; न तस्योत्सिषिचे मनः <ls>R. 17. 43</ls>; स्तूयमाना नोत्सिच्यंते <ls>K. 329.</ls> {@--3@} To overflow, increase.
